Text.Page: Oh dear, <PCNAME>, it looks like it's going to be even worse than we thought. Turns out, the tuwangi are planning to attack any non-tuwangi that comes onto the reservation! One of the {@LinkCreature:205#1006#Merchants} just went in there to trade a little while agoâ€”can you please go after him? Bring him back, or at least help him get out of there. His name is Boermas.

Jaedon sent you out in case I got attacked, did he? Well, it was a nice thought, if a bit late.

They seemed so nice when I got here, offering me food...it was too late before I realized that it was poisoned.
